name: BreathingSounds
0:
”Alexa open Breathing Sounds”
”Alexa ask Breathing Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: breathing sounds
des:
Embark on a journey of tranquility and inner peace with Breathing Sounds, your personal oasis in the chaos of everyday life. Crafted with care, this Alexa skill brings the calming essence of breathing sounds into your sanctuary, creating an atmosphere of serenity and harmony.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Breathing Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
